# ESLint & TSLint

// eslint-disable-line 规则名
/* eslint-disable */
/* eslint-disable 规则名 */
// eslint-disable-line

# Delete

/*eslint no-param-reassign: ["error", { "props": true }]*/
delete item.xx

# 提交跳过验证

git commmit -m --no-verify
